text: Egha dughiar mabar kɨ garima, gumazir kurar mam aremezɨ, me mozimɨn anefa. Gumazamiziba anefagha uamategha gumazir kurar arazir kurabagh amim, aven itir nguibar ekiamɨn ghue. Egha me izir dughiar kamɨn, me gumazir kurar kamɨn ziam fe. Arazir kam uaghan, an mɨngariba mongezɨ, e dar gari puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi.8:10 Hibrun akam deragha ves 10ɨn akabar mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
